channel.title: Equipment Tab Crash
channel.description:
Hey guys, so I've been messing around with my gameframe awhile and last night I saved everything and went to bed. My computer got unplugged somehow and so I can't undo anything I did on the files I edited. Now, whenever I click the equipment tab, it crashes the server. This is the error I get when it happens.
Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:8337) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1982) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8198) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8945) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:110) at client.run(client.java:4803) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Line 8337 in client: [code]k2 += class9_1.anInt263;[/code]
Line 1982 in client: [code]drawInterface(0, 28, RSInterface.interfaceCache[tabInterfaceIDs[tabID]], 37);[/code]
Line 8198 in client: [code]drawTabArea();[/code]
Line 8945 in client: [code]drawGameScreen();[/code]
Line 110 in RSApplet: [code]processDrawing();[/code]
Line 4803 in client: [code]super.run();[/code]
I cannot find out what the problem is, any help?

item.title: Equipment Tab Crash
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, so I’ve been messing around with my gameframe awhile and last night I saved everything and went to bed. My computer got unplugged somehow and so I can’t undo anything I did on the files I edited. Now, whenever I click the equipment tab, it crashes the server. This is the error I get when it happens.

I cannot find out what the problem is, any help?
